org.tigris.noodle
Interface NoodleReader

All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteNoodleReader, CharacterNoodleReader
public interface NoodleReader

NoodleReader is an interface which provides for an object which encapsulates the logic of taking an HttpResponse object and reading blocks of bytes from it. In some situations, this includes determining the start encoding and the output encoding, and transforming the bytes from the start encoding, into Unicode characters in Java, and then into bytes in the output encoding.

Author:
Ed Korthof

Method Summary
 ResponseBlock doRead()
          Retrieve the next block
 boolean readComplete()
          Ask if there is another block to be read.
 

Method Detail

readComplete

public boolean readComplete()
Ask if there is another block to be read. Note that this may include retrieving it into local storage in some situations.

doRead

public ResponseBlock doRead()
                     throws NoodleException
Retrieve the next block
